snippet: How to print out tax returns on TurboTax's iPad app if you don't have a wireless printer. It's much more complicated than you think.
abstract: How to print out tax returns on TurboTax's iPad app if you don't have a wireless printer. It's much more complicated than you think.

headline.main: Q&A: Printing Taxes From the iPad
headline.print_headline: Q&A: Printing a Tax Return From the iPad
